job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <strong><u>Description<br><br></u></strong>Associate Technology and Innovation (ATI) is a Customer Service organization enabling Amazon to become Earth’s most customer-centric company by efficiently building services, products and programs that deliver exceptional customer and employee experiences anywhere at scale. As a Data Scientist on the ATI Science team, you will have the opportunity to build and deploy game changing data science and machine learning solutions that deliver exceptional Associate experiences.<br><br><br><strong><u>Basic Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li> Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Applied Math, Operations Research, Economics, Engineering or a related quantitative field with three years of working experience as a Data Scientist</li><li> Experience in SQL, R, Python, or another scripting language</li><li> Track record of diving into data to discover hidden patterns and of conducting error/deviation analysis.</li><li> Knowledge of various machine learning techniques and key parameters that affect their performance.</li><li> Excellent written and verbal communication skills for both technical and non-technical audiences.</li><li> Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills</li><li> Extensive knowledge and practical experience in one or more of the following areas: machine learning, statistics, NLP, deep learning<br></li></ul><strong><u>Preferred Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li> Master’s degree in Statistics, Applied Math, Operations Research, Economics, Engineering or a related quantitative field</li><li> 5+ years of experience in data science<br><br></li></ul><strong>Company</strong> - Amazon.com Services LLC<br>Job ID: A1603329
